Class CustomerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.CustomerController

  • public class CustomerController
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    yair Controller class. Contains all the function that can be activated by a customer.

    • Method Detail

      • SubmitReview

        public static void SubmitReview(BookReview review)
        Adds a new book review to the data base. This function is used by the server.
        Parameters:
        review - The review to be added.

      • DownloadBook

        public static byte[] DownloadBook(java.lang.String format,
                                  java.lang.String paths)

      • BuyBook

        public static boolean BuyBook(ClientInterface clientInterface,
                              Customer customer,
                              Book book)
        Checks the possibility to sell the book to the customer. The function checks the validation of the customers account and if the customer already has this book. If all above are o.k then the correct price is being calculated according to the account type. A message is sent to the server to add the book to the customer's book list in the data base.
        Parameters:
        clientInterface - The main class of the program.
        customer - The customer requesting to buy a book.
        book - The book that is to be purchased.
        Returns:
        Returns true/false, according to whether the purchase had been completed or not.

      • AddBookToCustomer

        public static void AddBookToCustomer(Book book,
                                     int uid)
        Adds a book to a customer's book list using Customer_Book to the data base. This function is used by the server.
        Parameters:
        book - The book to be added.
        uid - The user ID.

      • MyBooks

        public static Book[] MyBooks(Customer customer)
        Returns all the customers books using the Customer_Book table. This function is used by the server.
        Parameters:
        customer - The customer whom books are to be return
        Returns:
        A list of books purchased by the customer.

      • WaitForAccountTypeChange

        public static void WaitForAccountTypeChange(ClientInterface clientInterface,
                                            Customer customer,
                                            int Type)
        Updates the account _waitingForChangeType status of a customer to a new type.
        Parameters:
        clientInterface - The main class of the program.
        customer - The customer whose account type is to be updated.
        Type - The new account type requested by the customer.

      • ValidateAccount

        public static boolean ValidateAccount(ClientInterface clientInterface,
                                      Customer customer)
        Checks if the customer's account is valid. Updates account type if the subscription date had been expired, and sends message to server to update the date in the data base. Uses ValidateAccountMessage() to notify the customer.
        Parameters:
        clientInterface - The main class of the program.
        customer - The customer whose account is validated.
        Returns:
        Returns true/false according to the validation of the account.

      • ValidateAccountMessage

        public static void ValidateAccountMessage(ClientInterface clientInterface,
                                          int print)
        Notifies the customer about the validation of the account.
        Parameters:
        clientInterface - The main class of the program.
        print - A flag to indicate the account validation status (WAIT, BLOCKED, EXPIRED).

      • UpdateCustomer

        public static void UpdateCustomer(Customer customer)
        Updates a customer in the data base. This function is used by the server.
        Parameters:
        customer - The customer to be updated.
